original_title: Cabinet nod to award design and construction of Ratmalana Railway Diesel Power Set Factory to  China Civil Engineering Construction Company
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers approved the proposal presented by the Minister of Transport and Highways to award the contract for the design and construction of the Ratmalana Railway Diesel Power Set Factory under the Railway Efficiency Improvement Project which is being implemented under Asian Development Bank funds, to China Civil Engineering Construction Company who was the lowest responsive bidder in accordance with the recommendation of the Cabinet Appointed Standing Procurement Committee.
